gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Please note: NOAA and NODC make no warranty, expressed or implied, regarding these data, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA and NODC cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Cite as: US Navy; Ships of Opportunity (2013). WATER DEPTH and Other Data from AIRCRAFT for 1971-01-22 (NODC Accession 7300247). National Oceanographic Data Center, NOAA. Dataset. [access date]

Data in this archival information package are not currently available for public download from the National Oceanographic Data Center. Please contact NODC User Services directly for access to these data.

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString:
Note: Metadata for this accession were extracted from a legacy database maintained by the U.S. National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC). The design of the database did not exactly reflect the FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata (CSDGM).
Principal Investigator (PI) and organization contact information accurately represents all available information from the legacy database at the time that this description was created. However, proper attribution of a PI to a specific institution or the role (submitting or collecting) taken by an institution may not be correct due to inexact mapping between fields in the legacy database and the CSDGM. Due to this uncertainty, the contact information was initially recorded in the Supplemental Information element of the CSDGM description.
To develop more accurate metadata, the NODC reviews metadata for all accessions on an ongoing basis.
Points of contact for this data set include: Contact info: Agency: US NAVY; SHIPS OF OPPORTUNITY PI: N/A Address: address: 4640 JEWEL ST., 204 city: SAN DIEGO state: CA postal: 92109-31331 country: UNITED STATES

gmd:fees.gco:CharacterString: Digital data may be downloaded from NODC at no charge in most cases. For custom orders of digital data or to obtain a copy of analog materials, please contact NODC User Services for information about current fees.

gmd:orderingInstructions.gco:CharacterString: When requesting analog data from the NODC, the desired data set should be referred to by the NODC Accession Number listed in this metadata record. Because the contents of this NODC archival information package are analog, you must contact NODC User Services for assitance in obtaining a copy of these data.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Navigate directly to the URL for a descriptive web page with download links.
Navigate directly to URL for descriptive web page.
Navigate directly to URL for descriptive web page.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata are developed, maintained and distributed by the NODC. Updates are performed as needed to maintain currentness.
